document.full_text: the weinstein company has officially responded to a lawsuit by two animated filmmakers who claim that harvey and bob weinstein botched the release of computer-animated movie "escape from planet earth" and then paid $500,000 in hush money to keep the dispute quiet on the verge of the academy awards.
document.title: weinstein company responds to "sabotage" claims
lines_and_colors: the weinstein company has officially responded to a lawsuit by two animated filmmakers who claim that harvey and bob weinstein botched the release of computer-animated movie "escape from planet earth" and then paid $500,000 in hush money to keep the dispute quiet on the verge of the academy awards.
